title: Stir-fried Spicy Beef
text:
A classic Hunan-style stir-fry dish, this spicy beef stir-fry combines tender slices of beef with chili peppers and aromatics for a flavorful kick. This dish is best served with steamed rice.

Ingredients | 用料



Ingredient
用料
Amount




Yellow beef
黄牛肉
250g


Ginger
姜
1 piece


Garlic
蒜
Half bulb


Oyster sauce
蚝油
2 tbsp


White pepper powder
白胡椒粉
To taste


Canola oil
菜籽油
As needed


Small chili peppers
小米辣
4 pieces


Pickled peppers
泡椒
1 handful


Cilantro
香菜
A handful





Steps | 步骤

Slice the beef against the grain into thin pieces. Marinate with 3 tbsp salad oil, 2 tbsp oyster sauce, a pinch of white pepper powder, and a little starch. Mix well, then add 1 more tbsp oil to lock in moisture.
Mince the ginger, chop the small chili peppers and pickled peppers into segments, and crush and chop the garlic.
Heat a pan until smoking hot, then add oil. Stir-fry the marinated beef quickly, adding a pinch of salt. Once the beef changes color, remove it from the pan immediately to keep it tender.
Chop the cilantro into 3–4 cm segments.
In the remaining oil, add the ginger, garlic, and chili peppers. Stir-fry until fragrant, then add a dash of soy sauce.
Return the beef to the pan, toss everything together quickly, then add the cilantro. Stir briefly and serve immediately.

title: Excel VBA Sales Management Tool
text:
A simple, automated Excel-based solution for effortless sales tracking, data entry, and visualization

The Story Behind This Project
This project started as a way to help my mom. She runs a small online store, managing every transaction manually in Excel. Since she’s not very familiar with technology, she spends hours inputting and organizing sales data, which is time-consuming and exhausting. I wanted to create something that would simplify her work, reduce the manual effort, and help her focus on what matters—growing her business and taking care of her health.
That’s how the Excel VBA Sales Management Tool was born. This tool automates data entry, ensures accuracy, and provides instant visual insights, making sales management faster, easier, and more efficient.


Key Benefits

Efficient Sales Data Management – Simplifies record-keeping with structured data entry and validation.

Dynamic Customization – Easily modify fields and parameters to adapt to business needs.

Automated Visual Insights – Instantly generate interactive charts to monitor sales trends.

Seamless Excel Integration – Built with VBA, leveraging Excel’s capabilities for smooth automation.



Features
✅ Dynamic Column Management – Add or modify data fields directly from the UI.
✅ Real-time Data Validation – Prevents errors by enforcing correct input formats.
✅ Batch Data Entry – Speed up workflows with multi-entry support.
✅ Automated Chart Generation – Instantly create bar charts, line graphs, and more.
✅ User-Friendly Interface – Designed for ease of use with minimal manual effort.
🔗 GitHub Repository: excel-ledger
🚀 Tech Stack: Excel, VBA

title: Personal Memo System – SQL, React & Python
text:
work in progress
A full-stack personal memo system leveraging MySQL, Express.js, React, and Python for structured data storage, automation, and analytics.
The Personal Memo System is designed to help users efficiently store, manage, and analyze structured personal data, such as financial records, health metrics, and goal tracking. By integrating SQL for data storage, Express.js for API management, React for a user-friendly interface, and Python for automation and analytics, this project serves as a comprehensive digital organization tool.

Purpose:
Provide a secure and structured memo management system for various personal data. Enable automated data backups and trend analysis for financial and health tracking. Offer an intuitive React-based frontend for easy data entry and visualization. Showcase full-stack development skills with SQL, API development, and Python automation.


Key Features:
✅ MySQL Database – Secure storage with relational data management.
✅ Express.js API – RESTful backend for seamless CRUD operations.
✅ React Frontend – Interactive UI for managing memos and visualizing trends.
✅ Python Automation – Scheduled database backups and analytical reports.
✅ Data Analysis – Uses Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn to provide insights.
The project is deployed on a Virtual Machine and integrates authentication, category-based organization, and an API-driven backend for structured data management.
🔗 GitHub Repository: MemoTrack-SQL
🚀 Tech Stack: MySQL, Express.js, React, Node.js, Python, Flask, Pandas, Tailwind CSS, Chart.js
This project is a practical learning experience, combining database management, backend development, frontend UI, automation, and data analytics into a single, full-stack system.

title: WeChat Chat Bot
text:
A Python-based chatbot for WeChat, integrating OpenAI’s API for AI-powered conversations.
The WeChat Chatbot enhances WeChat interactions by providing AI-driven conversational responses in real time. Built with Python, it leverages wxauto for WeChat automation and OpenAI’s API for intelligent, context-aware replies. This project showcases expertise in chatbot development, automation, and large language model (LLM) integration.

Purpose

Automate conversational responses using AI.

Maintain context for more relevant and coherent interactions.

Demonstrate Python-based WeChat automation and LLM API integration.



Key Features
✅ OpenAI Integration – AI-driven responses with conversation history management.
✅ WeChat Automation – Auto-retrieves and processes messages using wxauto.
✅ Context-Aware Conversations – Builds conversation context dynamically for better responses.
✅ Background Processing – Runs a background process for real-time message handling.
The chatbot functions as an AI assistant for WeChat, streamlining communication with automated, intelligent responses. It is designed to work with PC WeChat version 3.9.11.17.
🔗 GitHub Repository: ChatBot_WeChat
🚀 Tech Stack: Python, OpenAI API, wxauto, threading, logging
This project is a hands-on practice in AI-driven automation, chatbot development, and NLP-enhanced user interactions.

title: Silver Ear Lotus Seed Soup
text:
This traditional Chinese dessert is known for its nourishing and skin-beautifying properties. Silver ear fungus is rich in collagen-like polysaccharides, which help with hydration and skin health. It is especially popular in the summer for its cooling effect.

Ingredients | 用料



Ingredient
用料
Amount




Silver ear fungus
银耳
Half piece


Lotus seeds
莲子
20 pieces


Rock sugar
冰糖
To taste


Water
水
Sufficient to cover the ingredients





Steps | 步骤

Soak the silver ear fungus and lotus seeds in water for 1–2 hours until softened.
Tear the silver ear fungus into small pieces.
Wash the soaked ingredients thoroughly and place them into a rice cooker.
Add water until the ingredients are fully submerged.
Add rock sugar according to taste preference.
Use the “Soup” setting on the rice cooker and cook for at least 2 hours.
